Maija-Liisa Adams is a teacher at Peking University and previously taught at Brigham Young University-Idaho. She is the founder of Maija-Liisa Speaks, a company that has coached over 100 people from around the world to prepare for TEDx talks. Adams has spoken in exciting places herself, including a castle, and once gave a talk to over half a million people in India. She looks forward to hearing your speeches and hopes this experience helps you become confident and inspiring speakers!

Maija-Liisa Adams is a teacher at Peking University and previously taught at Brigham Young University-Idaho. She is the founder of Maija-Liisa Speaks, a company that has coached over 100 people from around the world to prepare for TEDx talks. Adams has spoken in exciting places herself, including a castle, and once gave a talk to over half a million people in India. She looks forward to hearing your speeches and hopes this experience helps you become confident and inspiring speakers!

Maija-Liisa Adams is a teacher at Peking University and previously taught at Brigham Young University-Idaho. She is the founder of Maija-Liisa Speaks, a company that has coached over 100 people from around the world to prepare for TEDx talks. Adams has spoken in exciting places herself, including a castle, and once gave a talk to over half a million people in India. She looks forward to hearing your speeches and hopes this experience helps you become confident and inspiring speakers!
